hadiths.text: Jabir b. ‘Abd Allah said:we used to offer supererogatory prayers and recite supplications while we were standing, and would glorify Allah while bowing and prostrating

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُجْزِئُ الأُمِّيَّ وَالأَعْجَمِيَّ مِنَ الْقِرَاءَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Minimum Recitation That Suffices An Illiterate Person Or A Non 'Arab
